title: Uresugi!! Tsuyasugi!? Buchou-chan
original_name: 熟れすぎ!! 艶すぎ!? 部長ちゃん
sinopse:
The manga centers on the department manager of a certain company's sales department, who boasts legendary skills. But in truth, she is a spontaneous and seductive woman. An unsuspecting new recruit to the company is assigned to her department.

(Source: ANN)
